comment: Last few recent versions have no sounds problem. The app will briefly show no internet connection before continues with loading UI banners. When you hit the play button it appears that now the song is playing (as it should) but no sounds. Toggle pause and play back and forth sometime working. But the more sure way is to kill the app and reopen. Even this method still need to do it for second time. All other apps on my phone don't have internet connection problem. No recent OS update.
scenarios:
The app briefly shows "no internet connection" before continuing to load UI banners, but all other apps on the user's phone do not have an internet connection problem.
When the play button is pressed, the song appears to be playing, but there is no sound. Toggling pause and play back and forth sometimes resolves the issue.
A more reliable method to get sound is to kill the app and reopen it, but this method often requires doing it a second time to work.
key sentence: When the play button is pressed, the song appears to be playing, but there is no sound. Toggling pause and play back and forth sometimes resolves the issue.
the function of activity: The activity involves searching for contacts, opening menus, initiating playback, controlling playback, managing playlists, sharing tracks, adjusting volume, and connecting to devices.
the sub-task list of state: [{'name': 'Play', 'description': 'Initiate playback of a track'}, {'name': 'Pause', 'description': 'Pause playback of a track'}, {'name': 'Next', 'description': 'Move to the next track in the playlist'}, {'name': 'Previous', 'description': 'Move to the previous track in the playlist'}, {'name': 'Repeat', 'description': 'Toggle repeat mode on or off'}, {'name': 'Add to Queue', 'description': 'Add the track to the playback queue'}, {'name': 'Share', 'description': 'Share the current track or playlist'}, {'name': 'Show Lyrics', 'description': 'Display the lyrics of the current track'}, {'name': 'Choose a Listening Mode', 'description': 'Select a listening mode or audio output device'}, {'name': 'Volume Control', 'description': 'Adjust the volume using volume keys'}, {'name': 'Access Device Menu', 'description': 'Open the devices menu for additional options'}]
